# uptimekuma_notification_grafanaoncall (Resource)

Grafana OnCall notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_grafanaoncall" "example" {
  name               = "Grafana OnCall Notifications"
  is_active          = true
  is_default         = false
  apply_existing     = false
  grafana_oncall_url = "https://grafana-oncall.example.com/integrations/v1/webhook/abc123/"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `grafana_oncall_url` (String, Sensitive) Grafana OnCall webhook URL
- `name` (String) Notification name

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
